trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a XAML serialization attempt is made on a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue`1" /> or <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue`1" /> 또는 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference`1" />에 대해 XAML serialization을 시도할 때 throw되는 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> and <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> are used for lambda expressions specified in code and are not XAML serializable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> 및 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>는 코드에서 지정한 람다 식에 사용되며 XAML로 serialize할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to serialize a workflow that contains a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> or <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>, a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> 또는 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>가 포함된 워크플로를 serialize하려고 하면 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException>이 throw됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the containing workflow requires XAML serialization, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue%601> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601>, or use <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> to convert the <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> or <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> to a serializable format.
trans-unit.target: 포함하는 워크플로에 XAML serialization이 필요한 경우 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue%601> 또는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601>를 사용하거나 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices>를 사용하여 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> 또는 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>를 serialize할 수 있는 형식으로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> class.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 오류 메시지를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: throw되는 예외에 대한 serialize된 개체 데이터입니다.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 원본 또는 대상에 대한 컨텍스트 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: serialize된 데이터를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 현재 예외를 발생시킨 예외이거나 내부 예외를 지정하지 않은 경우 null 참조(Visual Basic에서는 <see langword="Nothing" />)입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 오류 메시지와 해당 예외의 원인인 내부 예외에 대한 참조를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.
